scripts.obfuscate: javascript-obfuscator index.js --output _worker.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --control-flow-flattening-threshold 1 --dead-code-injection true --dead-code-injection-threshold 1 --string-array true --string-array-encoding rc4 --string-array-threshold 1 --transform-object-keys true --unicode-escape-sequence true
